text:

name: Roger Wayne
text: Just didn't enjoy the large pepperoni pizza.. Sauce bland and too much. Not any spiciness.. Not much pepperoni. Too much cheese maybe. Something off. Honestly enjoy The $4.99 Parlanno frozen pizza from Trader Joe's more.

name: Lord Rahl
text:
Great place and great prices! $10.78 for a Build-Your-Own?! Heck yes!
I also love that you can do a Half Pizza and Salad; perfect for one person!

name: James Lanier
text: Our new fave pizza. I like their chocolate chunk cookies and brownies too.  Ask for them to be warmed. You can go next door to the mkt and top the warm brownie with some version ice cream-ish while your pizza(s) is/are baking.

name: Kyle Elpel
text: Close to where I live, fast, affordable. My go to hangover food

name: Reana D
text: Delicious pizza! Got the Pepperoni Pizza and also a Vegetable Pizza a while back, and they were to die for. The cheese had a great flavor, the sauce was excellent, the crust was simply amazing, and the vegetables were super fresh and tasty. When I visit SLO again, I definitely will be back.

name: Brian Cody
text: I want to rate Blaze Pizza higher, I really do. Because really, if your pizza is made wrong, you only have yourself to blame. I love the build your own concept and Blaze does it well. And the pizza is pretty consistently good. But I have ‚Ä¶More

name: J Souza
text: Stopped here to order a couple pizzas today,  the way home to San Diego....i ordered the 2 specialty pizzas and they literally forgot to put cheese on the pizza...when I tried to tell them they told me I would have to get in line and wait ‚Ä¶More

name: Mitos Zshornack
text: Always loved Blaze Pizza. This particular location at San Luis Obispo though has always seemed much better than other locations. I also love the beer/lager/IPA selection at this location.

name: Ryan Stone
text: This is one of the best run Blaze Pizza's. The staff is freindly, the owners are involved and care, and the Pi Day $3.14 pizza bonanaza went off without a hitch. It was well staffed, delicious, and ran seamlessly. Would recommend this place ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew McPhail
text: I love this place. Great prices for a custom pizza. Unlimited fresh toppings, CAULIFLOWER crust, and service with a smile‚Äîall I need. Loving the crust options. I highly recommend the cauliflower crust. The keto crust is a bit too soft for me. I like a crunch. Drink selection and dough knots are also bomb. Will def be back.

name: Ryan G
text: I came here for lunch with my parents and ordered a build your own with all the toppings I enjoy. This is something I like about Blaze is they are happy to continue put toppings until I am satisfied. My parents also enjoyed making their own creations. This is my first time going in SLO can't wait to continue go when I am in the area.

name: Lindsey Walters
text: Great pizza. Very fast and many topping choices. Staff were incredibly friendly! Would come back often if I lived here.

name: Michelle C. Torres-Grant
text: I was pleasantly surprised at the value of this place. I got the half pizza + salad special (one could get 4 garlic pesto dough knots instead of a salad), and it was only about $8.45 or so. There was a choice of 4 salads. I chose the one ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy F
text: Great employees at this build your own pizza place. They have several different crust options (including gluten free and keto), and you can even do a half pizza if you want a smaller portion. You watch and direct as the worker builds the pizza. It's delicious and fun too.

name: Kim Lee Doherty
text: Great visit to Blaze Pizza today. Had a full & friendly staff. Mozzarella Tomato Salad Pizza was wonderfully delicious ‚ù£  Seating area was nice & clean. Self service areas were clean & well stocked! ‚Ä¶More

name: Ora Chapman
text: Great pizza! Combo is the way to go.  Pepperoni is a little on the salty side. Good crust! I would recommend to friends!
